titles.title: The Olive Without Crushing Yields No Oil (easy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The olive without crushing yields no oil The precious herb unbruised no fragrance frees No wine from grapes without the winepress toil Must I be bruised and pressed Lord such as these Lord Thy afflictions are true gain to me What Thou removest Lord replace with Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For sacred Love to find the melody Must my heart's strings be stretched And tuned by Thee Must I be smitten Lord to know Thy love I fear no loss if Thou draw close to me Lord Thy afflictions are true gain to me What Thou removest Lord replace with Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh how ashamed I feel for holding back You sculpted me yet I myself retain According to thy pleasure dear Lord act Mind not my feelings Thy delight is gain Lord Thy afflictions are true gain to me What Thou removest Lord replace with Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord should my joy and pain Not match Thine own I'll welcome - bear Thy yoke at any cost I'll take the suff'rings for Thy joy alone If You are pleased I'll gladly bear Thy cross Lord Thy afflictions are true gain to me What Thou removest Lord replace with Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I want to praise Thee with the sweetest praise On earth there is none fairer Lord than Thee Tears cloud my eyes yet sweetness fills my heart May I decrease - may Thou increase in me Lord Thy afflitions are true gain to me What Thou removest Lord replace with Thee{/lang-eng}
